blogPost.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
blogPost.body: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
blogPost.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: HomeWerk帮助团队进行社交活动，并建立更牢固的关系，而不受地点、时区和公司内部职位的限制。我们提供持续积极的自动化团队建设课程，让团队除了工作之外，还能谈论其他一切。
localize.tagline: 帮助团队在远程工作中保持快乐

localize.description: HomeWerk幫助團隊進行社交活動，並建立更牢固的關係，而不受地點、時區和公司內部職位的限制。我們提供持續積極的自動化團隊建設課程，讓團隊除了工作之外，還能談論其他一切。
localize.tagline: 幫助團隊在遠程工作中保持快樂
